string.name: pairing_ble_passkey_phrase_a
string.description: Message. Asks the user if the code on their Garmin device matches the code in the app. '%s' represents the code - you can move '%s' but do not translate it.

resources.string: Do you see the code %1$s displayed on your Garmin device?

string.name: pair_ble_friendly_name_pair_confirm_help
string.description: Message. Asks the user to confirm their Garmin device friendly name. '%s' represents the code - you can move '%1$s' but do not translate it.

resources.string: Do you want to pair with %1$s?

string.name: pairing_search_again
string.description: Button. Lets the user ignore the current device and keep searching.

string.name: lbl_ok
string.description: Button label for okay or acknowledgement.

string.name: lbl_done
string.description: Button label for done or finished.

resources.string: This sample demonstrates how to use the Bluetooth LE Generic Attribute Profile (GATT) to transmit arbitrary data between devices.
